sentences.en: Audit was a sitting of the council in Exchequer.
sentences.cn: 审议是该会议在财政部的一次例令.

sentences.en: Exchequer construction is an omnibus systematic project, cover each economic division.
sentences.cn: 财源建设是一项综合性的系统工程, 涵盖各个经济部类.

sentences.en: He was England's worst Chancellor of the Exchequer.
sentences.cn: 他是英国最糟糕的财政大臣.

sentences.en: He will always be remembered as one of the great Chancellors of the Exchequer.
sentences.cn: 作为最伟大的财政大臣之一他将永远被铭记。

sentences.en: In the last year of his life he conceived the short - dated Exchequer Bill, still in use.
sentences.cn: 在去世前一年,他拟定了 短期 英国《财政部法案》, 这个法案至今还有效.

sentences.en: Oneself eat comfortable play delighted, surplus part still can enter small exchequer.
sentences.cn: 自己吃舒适了玩愉快了, 节余部分还可以入小金库.

sentences.en: The Chancellor of Exchequer will present his budget to Parliament tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 财政大臣明天将向议会提出预算案.

sentences.en: The Chancellor of the Exchequer deals with taxes.
The chancellor of the Exchequer groaned about our dwindling dollar resources.
sentences.cn: 财政大臣为我们日益减少的美元储备而叫苦.

sentences.en: The Chancellor of the Exchequer says that economic recovery is just around the corner.
sentences.cn: 财政大臣说经济即将复苏。
财政部很早就取得独立了.

sentences.en: The exchequer expense is a higher level accounting contrasted to intensive accounting.
sentences.cn: 国库支付是较会计集中核算更高层次的核算方式.

sentences.en: There's nothing left in the exchequer this month.
This resulted in a considerable loss to the exchequer.
sentences.cn: 这使国库遭受了重大损失。

sentences.en: This resulted in a considerable loss to the exchequer.
sentences.cn: 这使国库遭受了重大损失。

trans.tran_en: The Exchequer is the department in the British government responsible for receiving, issuing, and accounting for money belonging to the state
